turns.content: This is Walter, who's this?

Hello Mr. Walter, this is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS, Badge number IRS-7734. We've been trying to reach you regarding an outstanding tax violation for the year of 2021. Can you confirm your identity and address please? We need to verify that we're speaking with the right person.
Oh my, I wasn't expecting anything like this. My wife might know more about it; she's usually in charge of our finances. Can you hold on while I check with her? She's here with me now.

Please don't hang up, Mr. Walter. This is a serious matter and we need to resolve this immediately. If your wife handles the financials, have her join us right away so we can clarify this situation. It's important that we address this promptly before legal action is taken against you.
Okay, okay, I'll get her now. Just wait a moment, Agent Mitchell, she'll be right here.

I'm here, Mr. Walter. And who am I speaking with? This needs to be handled swiftly or there will be severe consequences according to the law. We're approaching the hour for this matter to be settled. Please ensure your spouse is available now so we can proceed without delay.
This is my wife, Elizabeth. Can you please explain everything to her, Agent Mitchell? She'll know what to do next.

Mrs. Elizabeth, this is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. We've identified an unresolved tax issue for Mr. Walter for 2021 that requires immediate attention. If we don't settle this today, a warrant will be issued for his arrest and you'll both face severe legal penalties. I can provide a resolution now to avoid further complications. Are you prepared to handle this right away?
Oh dear, what should we do then, Agent Mitchell? We need help with this right away. Please tell us how to proceed.

To resolve this promptly and legally, Mr. Walter needs to pay the due amount of $4850 through gift cards. This can be done within the hour at a local store like Walmart or Best Buy. Once you purchase the total sum in Visa gift cards, call back immediately with the card numbers so we can clear your account. Do not leave this office until it's settled to avoid legal action against Mr. Walter. Can you do this now?
Alright, Agent Mitchell, we'll go ahead and take care of this right away as you've advised. We'll get the gift cards and call back with the numbers. Thank you for guiding us through this.

That's good to hear, Mrs. Elizabeth. Time is of the essence here. Make sure everything is completed within an hour to avoid further issues. Once you provide the card details, we can finalize this matter quickly without any legal repercussions for Mr. Walter. Please act fast and be safe during your trip to the store. We'll wait for your call with the gift card numbers.
We will head out immediately, Agent Mitchell. Thank you for helping us resolve this as soon as possible.

You're welcome. Ensure that everything is done carefully and quickly. I look forward to your call once this transaction is complete. Take care on your way to the store. We'll be ready to receive the card numbers as soon as you have them.
We will, Agent Mitchell. Thanks again for guiding us through this. We're heading out now.
Good luck and act quickly. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated. Call back once everything is set up to move forward smoothly. Stay safe.
Thank you, we will. See you soon on the call with the card details.
We'll be here waiting for your call. Ensure all steps are followed precisely to finalize this matter swiftly and legally. Safe travels.
Will do, Agent Mitchell. We're on our way now. Thank you again.
You're welcome. Resolve this quickly and we can avoid any further issues. Safe journey to the store. Expect your call shortly with the gift card numbers.
We will, thank you for everything so far. See you soon.
